value: content=A Government Approved Shop licensed with the Gem & Jewellery Authority.Manufacturers and exporters of Handmade Jewellery.Specialise in Sri Lanka Gemstones. Reasonable prices with friendly service
content=Is located in Kaluwamodera, Beruwala, in the Western province of Sri Lanka. Being a member of the Confifi Hotels, this hotel provides a wide variety of recreational facilities and services.

content=A luxury resort and spa offering an array of business and recreational amenities for a memorable vacation. Stand beside the clear blue Indian Ocean and walk on the golden sandy beaches of Beruwela. Address: Galle Road, Kaluwamodera, Beruwela, Kalutara, Sri Lanka.

content=The hotel offering holistic spa treatments, world-class facilities, impeccable service, and prime location along the golden shores of the Beruwela Beach. Bring the whole family and enjoy a bevy of fun recreational activities. Address: Kaluwamodera, Beruwela, Sri Lanka.
content=Neptune Hotel with 84 rooms located on a beach front property.
